duties_responsibilities.duty: Driving store sales and growth by personally selling to customers.
Proactively engaging with customers, reading cues, and responding effectively.
Delivering a friendly and efficient cash wrap experience, processing customer transactions accurately and efficiently at the Point of Sale.
Replenishing merchandise to brand standards to ensure product is placed on the sales floor and available for purchase.
Maintaining a focus on bras as the premier product differentiator, to build loyalty and support our "Best at Bras" culture.
Preparing for each shift by maintaining awareness of all sales, promotions, and applicable ringing procedures.
